house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1936 has 6 bedroom(s), 6 bath(s) , 2 car attached garage and approximately 6233 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Wimbish-Riteway Realtors Lic. Real Estate Broker

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Den, Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom
